headline: Is Major S&P Index Inclusion Altering The Investment Case For Helvetia Baloise Holding (SWX:HBAN)?
summary: Earlier in December 2025, Helvetia Baloise Holding Ltd (SWX:HELN) was added to several major S&P indices, including the S&P Global 1200, S&P EUROPE 350, S&P EUROPE 350 Financials, and S&P EUROPE 350 Insurance, as well as the S&P International 700. This index inclusion materially raises the company’s profile with global investors and index-tracking funds, potentially broadening its shareholder base and deepening liquidity over time. We’ll now examine how Helvetia Baloise’s entry into major...

headline: Piper Sandler Adjusts Huntington (HBAN) Target After Strategy Refresh
summary: Huntington Bancshares Incorporated (NASDAQ:HBAN) is included among the 13 Best Blue Chip Stocks to Buy Under $50. On December 10, Piper Sandler raised its price target on Huntington Bancshares Incorporated (NASDAQ:HBAN) to $16 from $15, while keeping an Underweight rating. The update followed the company’s release of slides for an upcoming conference, which highlighted a […]

headline: How The Huntington Deal Is Changing The Story Behind Cadence Bank’s Valuation
summary: Cadence Bank's latest narrative update leaves its fair value estimate essentially unchanged at $42.70 per share, even as analyst sentiment fractures around the recently announced all stock sale to Huntington Bancshares. While bulls point to refreshed targets in the mid to upper $40s and strategic upside from joining a larger regional platform, skeptics warn that most of the takeover premium is already priced in and highlight a long road of integration risk through early 2026. As these...
